pages.text: These $(item)little guys$() are here to help you with your $(thing)Synthesis$()! They can make anything you desire as long as you know the $(item)recipe$() and bring them the $(l:kingdomkeys:synthesize/materials)materials$(). They will also sometimes sell you useful $(l:kingdomkeys:customize/items)items$() such as Potions. If you give one $(thing)Moogle$() your materials, all $(thing)Moogles$() will have access to them, so don't worry about losing your materials.
If you're having trouble finding them in the wild, You should consider keeping an $(thing)Anvil$() on you. Dropping one on a Moogle's head can help you make them your $(thing)permanent friend$().
